# Error Attributes

- [Stable Attributes](#stable-attributes)
  - [error.type](#errortype)

## Stable Attributes

### error.type

Describes a class of error the operation ended with.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | maybe |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | Yes |
| Example | `timeout` |
